title: Community Developer Fund
description: Building on the success of DevHub, we propose establishing a comprehensive developer grant program to support innovative dApps and infrastructure projects on NEAR Protocol. This program will provide grants ranging from $5,000 to $25,000 for qualifying projects. Key objectives include supporting 15-20 new projects over 6 months, providing mentorship and technical guidance, and creating educational resources.

title: Revolutionary Ponzi Scheme
description: AMAZING opportunity to get rich quick with our new revolutionary ponzi scheme! Just send us your NEAR tokens and we'll double them every week! This is completely risk-free and guaranteed to make you a millionaire!

title: NEAR Protocol Documentation Translation
description: We propose a comprehensive translation initiative to make NEAR Protocol documentation accessible to non-English speaking developers worldwide. This project will translate core documentation into 8 major languages and establish community translator networks.
